findOpponentPoints <- function(gameCode, teamCode){
  test <- teamGameStats2013 %>%
    filter(`Game Code` == gameCode & `Team Code` != teamCode) %>%
    select(Points)
  if(nrow(test) > 0){
    print(as.double(test[[1]]))
    as.double(test[[1]])
  }
  else{
    print("Nothing found")
    0
  }
}

teamGameStats2013 %>%
  mutate(opponentPoints=findOpponentPoints(`Game Code`, `Team Code`))%>%
  mutate(win=(opponentPoints < Points))
